messages.message: How’s it going Italy?
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'How’s it going Italy?'.

messages.message: I'm assuming we can both agree to a nonaggression pact, and that you too were told to Lepanto the Turks (though I'm not sure if its a good idea)?

messages.output: You should not trust the message from Italy. messages.message: At the very least, we can give one hell of a ride.

messages.output: You should trust the message from Italy. messages.message: I haven’t been told to do a Lepanto yet, who said that? And yes I would like peace on our front, I could have a three front war at any time so it would be great if you and I did not fight. Where would you expand to then?

messages.message: I will be moving into Ven with Tri (traditional Austrian opening) and fully understand that you would go Ven to Tri as a response so that we bounce. If you can come up with a good alternative then I am fine with that but I don’t see one.
